name: AutoChronos
description:
-WASD / ARROWS TO MOVE

-SPACE TO CHRONO JUMP

-R TO UNDO LAST JUMP


A discovery has been found in Egypt. The small onyx creature is about three and a half feet tall and emits constant Cosmic Rays making it a danger to general personnel. It must be kept in a containment fluid that suppresses its effects.

Further research is being conducted on this creature as it could potentially hold the key to accessing the 4th dimension; Time.
